title: Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: F. J.", ca. 1920–40
medium: Pen and black ink, graphite on cream illustration board
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower right: F. J.
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description:
Circular monogram with initials drawn in black ink outline comprised of a rounded "F", a circle forming the lower branch conjoined with a rounded "J" with pie-shaped dot.
